title: Integrate unit testing framework
description: Set up a unit testing framework to ensure code quality and reliability.

subtasks.title: Install the chosen unit testing framework
Configure the framework for the project
Set up a folder structure for test files
Write sample unit tests for existing code
Integrate the framework with the build process
Run tests to verify the setup
Document the testing setup and usage
Train the team on using the framework

details: Choose a framework compatible with the tech stack.
